meanings.def: used when you are leaving somebody or when somebody else is leaving
examples: Goodbye! It was great to meet you.
She didn't even say goodbye to her mother.
Say goodbye to Mary for me.
(figurative) Take out our service contract and say goodbye to costly repair bills.

meanings.def: to accept that you will lose something or be unable to do something
examples: Well, you can kiss goodbye to your chances of promotion.

idioms.idiom: kiss something goodbye | kiss goodbye to something
idioms.def: to accept that you will lose something or be unable to do something
examples: Well, you can kiss goodbye to your chances of promotion.
